mapper.insert: insert into funding_question (funding_code, member_code, content, subject, regdate, state) values ({#fundingCode), (#memberCode), (#content), (#subject), (#regdate), (#state)}
mapper.select: select code, funding_code, member_code, content, subject, regdate, state from funding_question where member_code=#{_parameter}
select code, funding_code, member_code, content, subject, regdate, state from funding_question where code=#{_parameter}
